name: Nevada National Guard Tuition Waiver
description: 100% waiver of resident tuition and certain lab fees at Nevada state-supported institutions for active Nevada National Guard members in good standing. Transferable to immediate family members (spouse or dependent child). NOT available at: William S. Boyd School of Law, UNR School of Medicine, UNLV School of Dental Medicine. Must maintain 2.0 GPA.
eligibility: Active Nevada National Guard member in good standing
At beginning and throughout entire semester
benefit_amount: 100% tuition + lab fee waiver (excludes law, medicine, dental schools)
how_to_apply: Contact institution's veterans office; call 775-887-7326
source_name: Nevada National Guard / University of Nevada System

name: Purple Heart FREE Tuition
description: Veterans awarded the Purple Heart receive FREE tuition at ANY Nevada state school. Veteran does NOT need to be Nevada resident. Registration, laboratory, and other mandatory fees are waived. Student deemed bona fide Nevada resident for tuition purposes.
eligibility: Awarded Purple Heart for U.S. Armed Forces service
benefit_amount: FREE tuition + registration + lab + mandatory fees (all state schools)
how_to_apply: Submit Purple Heart documentation to Nevada institution

name: Tuition Waiver for Children/Spouse of KIA National Guard
description: Children or surviving spouse of Nevada National Guard member killed in line of duty receive waiver of resident tuition and lab fees at state institutions. Child: 10 years after age 18. Surviving spouse: 10 years after member's death. NOT available at law, medicine, or dental schools.
eligibility: Child OR surviving spouse of NV National Guard member KIA
Spouse: within 10 years of member's death
benefit_amount: Tuition + lab fee waiver (excludes law/medicine/dental)
how_to_apply: Contact Nevada System of Higher Education with KIA documentation

name: Financial Grant for Dependents of Active Duty KIA
description: Dependents of active-duty member killed in line of duty while permanently stationed in Nevada may be eligible for financial grant that does NOT require repayment.
eligibility: Member killed in line of duty
benefit_amount: Financial grant (no repayment required)
how_to_apply: Contact Nevada Department of Veterans Services

name: In-State Tuition for Active Duty and Dependents
description: Military personnel receive waiver of non-resident fees. Spouses and children of active duty and Nevada National Guard members receive waiver of nonresident fees. If active duty member receives PCS to state other than Nevada, spouses/dependent children REMAIN Nevada residents for tuition as long as continuously enrolled.
eligibility: Active duty stationed in Nevada OR spouse/child
OR Nevada National Guard member spouse/child
Continuous enrollment maintained if PCS out of state
benefit_amount: In-state tuition rates (non-resident fee waiver)
how_to_apply: Submit military orders/ID to Nevada institution

name: Wartime Veteran Property Tax Exemption
description: Annual property tax exemption for Nevada veterans who served in U.S. Armed Forces during wartime period. 2024-2025: $3,440 assessed value deduction. Can apply to vehicle privilege tax OR real property tax. Minimum 90 continuous days active duty with one day during wartime. Surviving spouses also eligible.
eligibility: At least 1 day during wartime period
benefit_amount: $3,440 assessed value deduction (2024-2025) for vehicle OR property tax
how_to_apply: Apply annually with County Assessor; valid NV license/ID + DD-214

name: Disabled Veteran Property Tax Exemption (60%+)
description: Property tax exemption for veterans with permanent service-connected disability of 60% or higher. Amount depends on degree of disability. Can apply to vehicle tax OR personal property tax. Surviving spouse may also be eligible.
eligibility: OR surviving spouse of eligible veteran
benefit_amount: Exemption amount based on disability percentage (60%-100%)
how_to_apply: Apply with County Assessor; NV license/ID + DD-214 + VA disability documentation

name: Motor Vehicle Registration Fee Reduction (OR Donation)
description: Veterans entitled to property tax exemption without sufficient property to claim full exemption may pay motor vehicle registration fees at TWO-THIRDS the usual rate. Alternatively, can DONATE exemption to Gift Account for Veterans Home in Southern Nevada.
eligibility: Nevada resident veteran entitled to property tax exemption
Insufficient property to claim full exemption
benefit_amount: 2/3 rate on vehicle registration OR donate to Veterans Home
how_to_apply: Apply at DMV with exemption number OR request paper voucher from Assessor

name: Nevada Day 3-Day Sales Tax Exemption
description: Nevada National Guard members and their immediate families eligible for 3-day sales tax exemption for Nevada Day holiday.
benefit_amount: 3-day sales tax exemption during Nevada Day
how_to_apply: Present Guard ID during Nevada Day holiday period

name: Veterans Employment Preference Points
description: Veterans and surviving spouses of line-of-duty deaths receive 10 points added to passing exam grade. Guard/Reserve members and other surviving spouses receive 5 points. Disabled veterans GUARANTEED interview. Non-disabled veterans must make up 22% of those interviewed for any open state job.
eligibility: Nevada veteran (10 pts) OR Guard/Reserve (5 pts)
OR surviving spouse line-of-duty (10 pts) OR other spouse (5 pts)
benefit_amount: 5-10 preference points + guaranteed interview (disabled) + 22% interview requirement
how_to_apply: Declare intent at application; submit proof of eligibility

name: State Employee Military Leave + Differential Pay
description: Nevada state employees in reserve components authorized 15 working days WITH PAY per year for approved training/deployment. If military pay less than state salary, receive DIFFERENCE between salary and military pay for those hours.
benefit_amount: 15 paid days/year + differential pay (if military < state salary)
how_to_apply: Follow state employee military leave procedures with orders

name: Nevada Employment Security Division Veteran Services
description: Veteran Employment Services designed to assist veterans and spouses with career development, job placement, training services.
eligibility: Nevada resident veteran OR military spouse
benefit_amount: Free employment services and career assistance
how_to_apply: Contact Nevada Employment Security Division
source_name: Nevada Department of Employment, Training and Rehabilitation

name: Office of Military Legal Assistance (OMLA)
description: FREE (pro bono) legal assistance and representation to active duty, Reserve, and Guard members in wide range of civil law matters. Also provides wills and powers of attorney to ALL veterans (not just active/Guard/Reserve). Statewide program combining legal aid, private sponsors, State Bar of Nevada.
eligibility: Active duty OR Reserve OR Guard (civil law + wills/POA)
OR veteran (wills and powers of attorney)
benefit_amount: FREE legal assistance, representation, wills, powers of attorney
how_to_apply: Call 775-687-2140 or email nvagomla@ag.nv.gov

name: Combination Hunting/Fishing License ($15) for 50%+ Disabled
description: Nevada resident veterans with 50% or higher service-connected disability receive combination hunting and fishing license for only $15.
benefit_amount: Combination hunting/fishing license for $15
how_to_apply: Apply through Nevada Department of Wildlife with VA documentation

name: $15 Combo License for Service Members Stationed Outside Nevada
description: Nevada resident service members stationed outside Nevada receive discounted $15 combination hunting and fishing license. Must show military ID and proof of duty station.
eligibility: Military ID + proof of duty station
benefit_amount: $15 combination hunting/fishing license
how_to_apply: Purchase from Nevada Department of Wildlife with military ID + duty station proof

name: Discounted License for Residents Home on Leave
description: Nevada residents stationed outside Nevada and home on leave receive discounted combination hunting and fishing license.
benefit_amount: Discounted combination hunting/fishing license
how_to_apply: Apply with Nevada Department of Wildlife; show military ID + leave papers

name: Nevada Veterans License Plates
description: Special veteran license plates available. $17 one-time fee for most plates plus annual vehicle license fee. FREE plates for: 100% disabled, POWs, Purple Heart, Pearl Harbor survivors, VA auto grant recipients. Various branch-specific and recognition plates.
eligibility: Some plates FREE (100% disabled, POW, Purple Heart, etc.)
benefit_amount: $17 one-time fee (most plates) OR FREE (qualifying veterans)
how_to_apply: Apply at Nevada DMV with proof of service/eligibility

name: Gold Star Family License Plates
description: Gold Star Family License Plate available for families with son, daughter, stepson, stepdaughter, parent, or step-parent killed in combat. 4-plate limit per family.
eligibility: Includes: son, daughter, stepson, stepdaughter, parent, step-parent
benefit_amount: Gold Star Family special license plates
how_to_apply: Apply at Nevada DMV with casualty documentation

name: Nevada State Veterans Homes
description: Two state veterans homes: Northern (Sparks - 96 beds, private rooms, opened 2018) and Southern (Boulder City - 180 beds, nursing services, Alzheimer's/dementia care).
benefit_amount: Subsidized skilled nursing care (2 locations, 276 total beds)
how_to_apply: Contact Nevada Department of Veterans Services for admissions

name: Nevada State Veterans Cemeteries
description: Three state veterans cemeteries in Angel Fire, Fort Stanton, and Gallup. Open to honorably discharged veterans and spouses.
benefit_amount: Burial at state veterans cemetery (3 locations)
how_to_apply: Contact Nevada Department of Veterans Services
